links.title: Biotech and Tech Stocks Are Approaching Make Or Break Moments
links.description: The stock market picked right up from where it left off last week, with the S&P 500 continuing to surging to 2,721 up about 1.1 percent today. Based on the charts, it seems like we have a pretty good shot of continuing to rise to somewhere between 2,740 and 2,760 before we see a significant region of resistance again.

links.title: Despite the Correction, This Sector of the Stock Market Is Still Silly Expensive
links.description: Small-cap stocks may still not be cheap enough in the wake of February's vicious market correction. Apple HomePod Sales Mediocre, iPhone X Sales Weak, Analysts Say http://ow.ly/zfYF30iLQi6 $AAPL

links.title: Apple HomePod Sales Mediocre, iPhone X Sales Weak, Analysts Say | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Wall Street analysts are tempering expectations for Apple's near-term prospects, citing weakness in iPhone X sales and a mediocre start for the HomePod smart speaker. JPMorgan on Friday cut its production estimates for Apple's premium iPhone X smartphone to 15 million units in the calendar first quarter, down from its prior view of 20 million.
